decision_conditions: For clarity, the applicant is reminded of their obligation to comply with all the relevant conditions of consent on the original planning permission (ref: P111832). The applicant is further reminded that the extent and nature of the agreed non material amendments are limited to the insertion of openings at basement to fourth floor levels of the north elevation to facilitate access to building D2 of the Regent Quarter Block D master plan (approved under planning ref: P090206, dated 01/04/2009) and the installation of a hoist between ground and first floors of the proposed office building. The Council have not agreed to any other alterations to the approved development under this application. It is further noted that the necessary alterations to building D2 have been agreed under non material amendment application P090206(MA07).
